ComicInfo.Summary: Major Maxim and his thugs have entered the home of the wealthy antiquity collector Eddy Owen. They demand for him to reveal the location of the "artifact", but they fail to get any information out of him. After ransacking his house and destroying priceless belongings they knock him unconscious and seemingly leave. . On the Danger Yacht, Deuce has rendevoued with the mysterious agent who helped Abbey and Sydney back in France. They exchange intel and the agent disappears, identity only known to Deuce. Meanwhile the Danger Girls and Johnny Barracuda arrive to find the house turned upside down and Eddy lying on the floor. After explaining to Eddy why they have come, Abbey and the others are led to Eddy's secret hiding spot where he keeps the artifact - a golden medieval helmet. However, upon revealing its location, Major Maxim and his underlings spring out from the shadows to ambush the Danger Girls and try to steal the helmet. Major Maxim is badly hurt, and in the ensuing fight, Natalia is shot after Maxim orders the house buldosed. Major Maxim leaves victorious with helmet in hand.
